chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
lllmi: leaderLogs_entries_match_interface
lhllsi: leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface
si: sorted_interface
lpholli: log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface

Goal:
forall (net : network) (h : Net.name) (h' : name), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h') <> 0 -> exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log (snd (nwState net h))) (Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (snd (nwState net h)) h')) = Some e

Premises:
snd = fun (A B : Type) (p : A * B) => let (_, y) := p in y : forall A B : Type, A * B -> B Arguments snd {A B}%type_scope
Record sorted_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_sorted_interface { handleAppendEntries_logs_sorted : forall (net : network) (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (m : msg), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_sorted net -> handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (st', m) -> pBody p =
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
getNextIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (state : RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output) (h : name) => assoc_default name_eq_dec (nextIndex state) h (maxIndex (log state)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), RaftState.raft_data term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output -> name -> logIndex Arguments getNextIndex {orig_base_params raft_params}
Record log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface { log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs net } Arguments log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_log_properties_hold_on_leader_logs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope

Record leaderLogs_entries_match_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_leaderLogs_entries_match_interface { leaderLogs_entries_match_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> leaderLogs_entries_match_host net } Arguments leaderLogs_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_leaderLogs_entries_match_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
Notation pred := Init.Nat.pred
findAtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findAtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : option entry := match entries with | [] => None | e :: es => if eIndex e =? i then Some e else if eIndex e <? i then None else findAtIndex es i end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> option entry Arguments findAtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope

Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope

Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope

nextIndex_safety = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (h' : name), type (nwState net h) = Leader -> Init.Nat.pred (getNextIndex (nwState net h) h') <= maxIndex (log (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments nextIndex_safety {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h : Net.name, type (snd (nwState net h)) = Leader -> exists ll es : list entry, In (currentTerm (snd (nwState net h)), ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) /\ log (snd (nwState net h)) = es ++ ll /\ (forall e : entry, In e es -> eTerm e = currentTerm (snd (nwState net h))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments leaders_have_leaderLogs_strong {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
